course_title: Advanced Health Assessment Across the Life Span

sections.comments: IF course is FULL please contact School of Nursing Student Support Office (academic.support@nursing.ubc.ca)This course is prioritized for 1st MN-NP students.This course builds on basic health assessment skills to provide a solid foundation for integrating advanced health assessment with diagnostic reasoning and clinical decision-making. The primary focus of the course is on history taking, physical assessment, and the process of formulating differential diagnoses in a primary care context. A secondary focus emphasizes prevention and health maintenance strategies with individuals and families across the lifespan.
